attributes.action: lobby the EU for the creation of an (FBI style) EU Multinational Child Abduction task force
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the terrible abduction of 3 year old Briton Madeleine McCann in Portugal, and in light of the possible movement without documentation to Spain and elsewhere within the EU, that it would be prudent for the British Government to work towards the introduction with our fellow EU member states of an "EU Multinational Child Abduction task force" that: is made up of detectives from all 27 member nationalities, and has supreme jurisdiction in child abduction cases and in all investigations EU wide. Such a team such be self supporting with all elements required to operate independently in all 27 member states - charged with locating and returning abducted/kidnapped children to their families by all legal means at their disposal. Much like the US uses the FBI in similar such circumstances across all 50 US states.
